songs.title: As You Turn Away
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Standing face to face
Wrapped in your embrace
I don't wanna let you go
But you're already gone

[Verse 2]
Now you kiss my cheek
Soft and bittersweet
I can read it in your eyes
Baby, this is our goodbye

[Pre-Chorus]
Nothing more to say
Nothing left to break
I keep reaching out for you
Hoping you might stay

[Chorus]
Nothing more to give
Nothing left to take
I keep reaching out for you
Reaching out for you
As you turn away

[Verse 3]
Let go of my hand
So I can feel again
Nothing's gonna hurt as much
As that final touch

[Verse 4]
No we can't be friends
Cause I don't think I could take seeing you
And knowing where we've been
I hope you understand

[Pre-Chorus]
Nothing more to say
Nothing left to break
I keep reaching out for you
Hoping you might stay

[Chorus]
Nothing more to give
Nothing left to take
I keep reaching out for you
Reaching out for you
As you turn away

[Verse 5]
One step my heart is breaking
One more my hands are shaking
The door is closing
And I just can't change it

[Pre-Chorus]
Nothing more to say
Nothing left to break

[Chorus]
Nothing more to give
Nothing left to take
I keep reaching out for you
Reaching out for you
I keep reaching out for you
Reaching out for you
As you turn away
As you turn away
As you turn away
